planParent.description: The name of the managed care plan parent

submissionDate.description: Date the data was submitted to DHCS

reportingPeriod.description: The last calendar day of the month being reported (the data should represent PCP assignments as of this day)

submissionType.description: If this file is the first submission for this reporting period, it is Original. If this is to replace a previously submitted file, it is a Resubmission

submissionVersion.description: First submission for a reporting period must be '001'. Any future submissions for the same reporting period (Resubmissions), must increment this by 1 for each additional submission

schemaVersion.description: The version of the schema to which the submitted file adheres

planCode.description: The plan code for each county which plan operates in. Do not report subcontracting health plans separately

cin.description: The member's CIN number – a nine-digit number that consists of eight numbers and one letter. CINs must lead with a 9 and end with an alpha character

npi.description: The ten-digit NPI of the assigned primary care provider as of the last day of the reporting period
